This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=BIOLOGY-TEACHING.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-01-12T21:11:11Z Oliver Hooker 2015-01-12T21:10:41+00:00 2015-01-12T21:10:41+00:00 statistics course - ADVANCING IN R https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BIOLOGY-TEACHING;8b98a374.1501 STATISTICS COURSE 'ADVANCING IN R'<br><br>A repeat of the course titled 'ADVANCING IN R' has been arranged for 30th November \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 4th December 2015<br><br>The content designed to bridge the gap between basic R coding and more advanced statistical modelling. The course is aimed at PhD students and post docs (although people at any stage of their career are welcome) with basic to moderate knowledge in R. [...] Luc Morabitos 2014-10-19T10:43:51+02:00 2014-10-19T10:43:51+02:00 1st announcement: Synthetic and Systems Biology Summer School: Biology meets Engineering and Computer Science, Taormina - Sicily, Italy July 5-9, 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BIOLOGY-TEACHING;4c087197.1410 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BIOLOGY-TEACHING;4c087197.1410">1st announcement: Synthetic and Systems Biology Summer School: Biology meets Engineering and Computer Science, Taormina - Sicily, Italy July 5-9, 2015 </a> Oliver Hooker 2014-09-25T17:57:50+01:00 2014-09-25T17:57:50+01:00 'Spatial analysis of ecological data using R' STATISTICS COURSE https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BIOLOGY-TEACHING;e3cd1024.1409 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdSpatial analysis of ecological data with R\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd (NEW STATISTICS COURSE)<br><br>This course will cover the concepts and R tools that can be used to analyse spatial data in ecology covering elementary and advanced spatial analysis techniques applicable to both plants and animals.<br><br>The course will consist of a series of modules (listed below), [...] nexit 2014-05-30T01:35:59+00:00 2014-05-30T01:35:59+00:00 nexit@libero.it https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BIOLOGY-TEACHING;c43c6cb6.1405 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BIOLOGY-TEACHING;c43c6cb6.1405">nexit@libero.it </a>
